GeneticAlgorithm

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneticAlgorithm.GeneticAlgorithm

  • public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete class of an specific genetic algorithm It holds the necessary methods and attributes in such a way an user only needs to instantiate this class once

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentCountGeneration 
      private Individual[] currentGeneration
      Collection of Individuals Represents the population of the current generated/evolved generation
      private boolean elitism
      If true the fittest individual will be cloned for the next generation
      private double mutationRate
      Establishes the likelihood an arbitrary individual may mutate while evolving
      private int numberOfGenerations
      Specifies the maximum number of times the population of this genetic algorithm can be evolved
      private int populationSize
      Defines the number of individuals to be created/evolved per generation
      private int tournamentSize
      Implies the amount of individuals of the population that will compete in the tournament selections

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneticAlgorithm(int numberOfGenerations, int populationSize, int tournamentSize, double mutationRate, boolean elitism)
      Generate a new instance of this genetic algorithm with the given data

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Will update the value of this instance currentGeneration property.
      void displayCurrentGeneration()

      Individual[] getCurrentGeneration() 
      Individual getFittest() 
      void setCurrentGeneration(Individual[] updatedIndividuals)
      When necessary the current population may be forced to fit any provided For this concrete program it is required because the Individuals generated and evolved lack of fitness value, which can only be calculated after a simulation is performed so the fitness value for each individual is calculated outside this class and then here the results are received

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticAlgorithm

        public GeneticAlgorithm(int numberOfGenerations,
                        int populationSize,
                        int tournamentSize,
                        double mutationRate,
                        boolean elitism)
        Generate a new instance of this genetic algorithm with the given data
        Parameters:
        numberOfGenerations - specifies the maximum number of generations allowed
        populationSize - defines the number of individuals to be created/evolved per generation
        tournamentSize - implies the amount of individuals of the population that will compete in the tournament selections
        mutationRate - establishes the likelihood an arbitrary individual mutates while evolving
        elitism - if true the fittest individual will be cloned for the next generation

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentGeneration

        public Individual[] getCurrentGeneration()

      • getCurrentCountGeneration

        public int getCurrentCountGeneration()

      • getFittest

        public Individual getFittest()

      • computeNextGeneration

        public void computeNextGeneration()
        Will update the value of this instance currentGeneration property. If it is the first time this method is called, a set of new individuals will be generated randomly, otherwise it will use the current population to get the next one by evolution (tournaments + crossover) If the count of generations has reached the limit established by the numberOfGenerations property it does nothing

      • setCurrentGeneration

        public void setCurrentGeneration(Individual[] updatedIndividuals)
        When necessary the current population may be forced to fit any provided For this concrete program it is required because the Individuals generated and evolved lack of fitness value, which can only be calculated after a simulation is performed so the fitness value for each individual is calculated outside this class and then here the results are received
        Parameters:
        updatedIndividuals - a collection of Individuals It must contain the same amount of elements than this populationSize property

      • displayCurrentGeneration

        public void displayCurrentGeneration()
